title.narrative: Strengthening of hydro-meteorological services in Vietnam

description.narrative: ICI project between Finnish Meteorological Institute and Vietnam's National Hydro-meteorological Service, NHMS. Problem: lack of ICT tecnology, modern forecasting tools and service production approach in NHMS strategy and implementation. Aim: To increase c apacity of NHMS in the reduction of natural disaster risks and in the adaptation of Vietnamese society to climate change. To provide early warning services in the Red River delta, improve modern weather radar tools and technologies and enhance capacity of NHMS management staff. Activities: capacity building including on the job training, workshops and study tour to Finland.
